description.value:
The Celestial lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.2qTBrY7kenAWLwTz]{False Life}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.jl2cfJWH5fXqR8nf]{Ray of Sickness}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.GF3MCaxFoFwiSh8F]{Blindness/Deafness}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.IWxKwBugJfls3V7S]{Silence}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.iW5NVDmBSbUHeSUc]{Feign Death}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Z1dPExUkSVfR3Z10]{Speak with Dead}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Er9z3iNVPGp4UA0Q]{Aura of Life}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.3x7HVJ1Ube01KuDI]{Death Ward}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.7tit8B9S1sUwJ5Vo]{Contagion}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.E5n6OMRYNFhTLgUB]{Legend Lore}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
